name: stlint-vscode-plugin
description: Plugin STLint for Visual Studio Code

scripts.newversion: npm test && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run newversiongit && npm publish ./
scripts.newversiongit: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. Read more https://github.com/stylus/stlint-vscode-plugin/releases/tag/$npm_package_version " && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin HEAD:master

author: Chupurnov Valeriy<chupurnov@gmail.com>
